channel.title: CVE Feed for mostafas1990 -- WP Statistics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mostafas1990 -- WP Statistics

item.title: CVE-2024-2194|2024-08-01T19:03:39.096Z -- mostafas1990 -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the URL search parameter in all versions up to, and including, 14.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2194|2024-06-04T17:30:55.516Z -- mostafas1990 -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the URL search parameter in all versions up to, and including, 14.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
